main.title: Hi there
main.subtitle: Welcome to my profile
main.description1: I'm Kelwin Jhackson Gonçalves de Moura, born in Fortaleza, Ceará, Brazil. I'm interested in programming and enjoy games that offer immersive experiences, have a high level of technical detail, and are low in bugs, like Red Dead Redemption 2.
main.description2: I’m eager to expand my skills and contribute to innovative projects in a dynamic team environment.

themes.title: Animes
themes.description: Explore animes de meu interesse na tabela!! Adicione, edite ou exclua animes facilmente.
